trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays string values.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Windows 微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 會顯示字串值。

trans-unit.source: A DomainUpDown control displays a single string value that is selected from an <xref:System.Object> collection by clicking the up or down buttons of the control.
trans-unit.target: DomainUpDown 控制項顯示從選取的單一字串值<xref:System.Object>按一下向上或向下按鈕控制項的集合。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The user can also enter text in the control, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` (the string typed in must match an item in the collection to be accepted).
trans-unit.target: 使用者也可以輸入文字在控制項中，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`（在輸入字串必須符合可接受集合中的項目）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an item is selected, the object is converted to a string value so it can be displayed in the spin box.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目時，物件會轉換成字串值，以便顯示微調方塊中。

trans-unit.source: To create a collection of objects to display in the DomainUpDown control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Remove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立 DomainUpDown 控制項中顯示物件的集合，您可以新增或移除的項目個別使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can be called in an event handler, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of a button.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫事件處理常式中，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: The object collection can be sorted alphabetically by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可以依字母順序排序物件集合，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A> property is set to `true`, if you scroll past the last or first object in the collection, the list will start over with the first or last object respectively and appear to roll in a continuous list.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>屬性設定為`true`，如果您捲動過去的最後一個或第一次物件在集合中，清單將會從頭開始與第一個或最後一個物件分別並顯示連續的清單中向前復原。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpButton%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DownButton%2A> methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpdateEditText%2A> is called to update the control with the new string.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpButton%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DownButton%2A>方法呼叫，在程式碼，或按一下向上或向下按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpdateEditText%2A>呼叫來更新控制，以新的字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpdateEditText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DownButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.UpButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> is set to `true`, the string is matched to one of the values in the collection prior to updating the control's text display.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>設`true`，字串會對應到其中一個值，然後再更新控制項的文字顯示集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the DomainUpDown control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)]，將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整 DomainUpDown 控制項的大小︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的協助工具物件，以便<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有明確呼叫 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它會呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>參考屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入隨.NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownAccessibleObject>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Displays the next item in the object collection.
trans-unit.target: 顯示物件集合中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: As you move through the collection of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> control using the down button, you will eventually reach the last item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您移動執行中的項目集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項使用的向下按鈕，最終會在集合中的最後一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>

trans-unit.source: If you continue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A> is set to `true`, the list will start over with the first item in the collection and appear to be continuous.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要繼續，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>設`true`，清單將會從頭開始與集合中第一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the up button.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用最新的按鈕在集合內移動時，也會發生這種行為。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects assigned to the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 指派給微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> collection can be built and made available to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> control in two ways.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>集合可以建置並提供給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項有兩種。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You can add items to the collection by using the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用集合加入項目<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection> that contains an <xref:System.Object> collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection>包含<xref:System.Object>集合。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItemChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItemChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedItemChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectedItemChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> control chooses the item on the list that begins with the character.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項選擇開頭為字元的清單中的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: If more than one item in the collection starts with the same character, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> control selects the next item that begins with the typed character, starting from the currently selected position.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中的多個項目開始時具有相同的字元，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項選取開頭為具類型的字元，從目前選取的位置開始的下一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnTextBoxKeyPress method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnTextBoxKeyPress 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref> control's contents and its edges.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定之間的間距<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref>控制項的內容和其邊緣。

trans-unit.source: Even if you set the Padding property, it will have a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.
trans-unit.target: 即使您設定 [填補] 屬性，它會具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>值

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Padding*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Padding*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index value of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取之項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property holds the index value of the item in the collection that is currently selected in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 屬性會保存在微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中目前選取的集合中項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Collection items can be reassigned new index values if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A> property has been changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 集合項目可以重新指派新的索引值，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A>屬性已變更從`false`至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: As the collection is re-sorted alphabetically, the items will be assigned a new index value.
trans-unit.target: 依字母順序重新排序集合的項目會被指派新的索引值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the user has entered an item in the spin box, or if no item has been selected, the SelectedIndex value will be the default value, -1.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果使用者輸入項目在微調方塊中，或如果尚未選取任何項目，SelectedIndex 值將是預設值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index value of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目以零為起始的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than the default, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值小於預設值，-1。

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Items*> count.
trans-unit.target: -或-指派的值大於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Items*>計數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected item based on the index value of the selected item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的項目，根據選取的項目集合中的索引值。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the value is validated to be one of the items in the collection, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A> property is set to the appropriate index value.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，是其中一個項目在集合中，驗證的值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性設定為適當的索引值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The selected item based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex*> value.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex*>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem*> property has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: For the SelectedItemChanged event to occur, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem%2A> property can be changed in code, by the user typing in a new value or clicking the control's up or down buttons.
trans-unit.target: SelectedItemChanged 事件發生，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem%2A>由使用者輸入新的值，或按一下控制項的向上或向下按鈕，可以在程式碼中變更屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item collection is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否排序項目集合。

trans-unit.source: When Sorted is set to `true`, the collection is sorted in alphabetical order.
trans-unit.target: 當排序設`true`，依字母順序排序集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item collection is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果排序項目集合。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The return string includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串包含類型和值<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Displays the previous item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 顯示集合中的上一個項目。

trans-unit.source: As you move through the collection of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> control using the up button, you will eventually reach the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您移動執行中的項目集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項使用的最新的按鈕，最終會在集合中的第一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>

trans-unit.source: If you continue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A> is set to `true`, the list will start over with the last item in the collection and appear to be continuous.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要繼續，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>設`true`，清單將會從頭開始與集合中最後一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown.Wrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the down button.
trans-unit.target: 當您瀏覽集合中的向下按鈕時，也會發生這種行為。

trans-unit.source: Updates the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to display the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 更新微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），以顯示選取的項目中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection of items continues to the first or last item if the user continues past the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否的項目收集會持續進行的第一個或最後一個項目，是否使用者持續超過清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: When the Wrap property is set to `true`, if you reach the last item in the collection and continue, the list will start over with the first item and appear to be continuous.
trans-unit.target: 當換行屬性設定為`true`，如果您連線到集合中的最後一個項目，並繼續，清單將會從頭開始與第一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。

trans-unit.source: This behavior works in reverse as well.
trans-unit.target: 此行為的運作方式以及反向。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list starts again when the user reaches the beginning or end of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果清單再次開始當使用者達到的開頭或結尾的集合。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
